sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { CButton, CCard, CCardBody, CCardFooter, CCardHeader, CCol, CForm, CFormGroup, CFormText, CTextarea, CInput, CLabel, CModal, CModalHeader, CModalBody, CModalFooter, CModalTitle, CValidFeedback, CInvalidFeedback } from '@coreui/react' import CIcon from '@coreui/icons-react' import { userSetter } from 'core-js/fn/symbol'; const CreateNode = () => { const [appName, setAppName] = useState(""); const [hostName, setHostName] = useState(""); const [owner, setOwner] = useState(""); const [group, setGroup] = useState(""); const [groupMail, setGroupMail] = useState(""); const [desciption, setDesciption] = useState(""); const [wasFormValidated, setWasFormValidated] = useState(""); const createNodeReq = async (e) => { const payload = { appName: appName, hostName: hostName, owner: owner, group: group, groupMail: groupMail, desciption: desciption } setWasFormValidated(true); }; return ( <> Create a new node createNodeReq(e)} className="form-horizontal"> Application Name setAppName(e.target.value)} /> Please input a valid name. Host Name setHostName(e.target.value)} /> Please input a valid host name. App Owner setOwner(e.target.value)} /> Please input a valid owner. Group Name setGroup(e.target.value)} /> Please input a valid group name. Group Email setGroupMail(e.target.value)} /> Please provid a valid email address. Description setDesciption(e.target.value)} rows="3" /> Please input something.
Submit Reset
) } export default CreateNode
